meanings.definition: Something that completes or enhances something else when added to it.
meanings.sent1: The extra decorations were the perfect supplements to the party.
meanings.sent2: She used colorful pillows as supplements to her plain sofa.
meanings.sent3: The funny hat was a silly supplement to his serious outfit.
meanings.sent4: Laughter acted as a supplement to the gloomy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sunshine was a much-needed supplement to the rainy day.

meanings.definition: A pill, powder, liquid, or other preparation containing vitamins, minerals, herbs, amino acids, or other ingredients, taken as a dietary supplement.
meanings.sent1: She took her daily supplements to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a calcium supplement for stronger bones.
meanings.sent3: The colorful pills looked like candy, but they were actually supplements.
meanings.sent4: The vitamins acted as a supplement to her balanced diet.
meanings.sent5: The herbal supplement had a calming effect on her nerves.
